biotools.summary:
tsRBase: Comprehensive Database for tsRNA Expression and Function.

The tsRBase is a comprehensive database of tsRNA sequence, expression features and function for multiple species. It provides information of over 120,000 tsRNAs which collected from high-throughput sequencing data of 20 species, including bacteria and fungi, plant and animal. Furthermore, tsRBase explored and displayed proteins associated tsRNAs from CLIP/RIP data, as well as tsRNAs’ targets from CLASH and CLEAR-CLIP data, which might reveal the role of tsRNA in vivo.
